name: SKY0
description: SkyTrade is a pioneering platform that enables individuals, property owners, and communities to unlock the hidden value of their air rights, the legal rights to control, lease, or trade the airspace above land and buildings. Through blockchain technology and tokenization, SkyTrade transforms unused low-altitude airspace into a digital asset class, allowing users to securely and transparently monetize, trade, and manage their aerial property. By bridging real-world assets with decentralized finance, SkyTrade empowers participants to generate new income streams from drone operations, urban air mobility, and other next-generation aerial services, creating a fair and efficient global air rights marketplace for the modern economy.
